title: Vegetarian Lasagna
description: Rich and hearty lasagna with vegetables and three cheeses
instructions: Cook lasagna noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside.
Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add onion and garlic, cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add bell peppers, zucchini, and eggplant. Cook until vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes.
Add crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, oregano, and basil. Season with salt and pepper.
Simmer for 15 minutes until sauce thickens.
In a bowl, mix ricotta, half the mozzarella, half the Parmesan, and egg.
In a 9x13 baking dish, layer noodles, ricotta mixture, vegetables, and remaining cheeses.
Repeat layers, ending with cheese on top.
Cover with foil and bake for 30 minutes.
Remove foil and bake for 15 minutes until golden and bubbly.
Let rest for 10 minutes before serving. Garnish with fresh basil.
notes: This can be assembled ahead of time and refrigerated. Add 15-20 minutes to baking time if cooking from cold.
